title: Romain Bardet: Second Place in Liège-Bastogne-Liège ‘Feels like a Victory’
content:
Mindset and experience pay off in thrilling battle after Côte de Roche-aux-Faucons and tearful finale: 'I wanted to give everything I have.'

Read the full article at Romain Bardet: Second Place in Liège-Bastogne-Liège ‘Feels like a Victory’ on Velo.
author: sstokes
